Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Harlem(O'Hare)
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing Harlem (O'Hare) due to a mechanical problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing Harlem (O'Hare) due to a mechanical problem.

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
